website_summaries.verdict: A standard chandelier ceiling fan that will look fine in any room, but it doesn't stand out against the crowd.
pros: You can control it with pull chain
cons: The wood element of the fan means that it can break if you don't take care of it properly

customer_reviews.title: Came defective twice, but beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: The fan is beautiful, and a great value for the price. My only issue is that two legs of the light didn't work with the first one I ordered. Amazon immediately shipped another, and I had the same issue. The electrician wired it correctly, but we both agreed that it was in the unit. He took the internal mechanisms of the fan apart, and realized that it came from the factory wired wrong. When he rewired the internal part of the unit, the fan worked fine. It was a lot of extra work, but I do love it.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Very Elegant!
customer_reviews.text: This is the pretties fan ever. It wasn’t that difficult to put together but it did take some time but soooo worth it. My electrician was able to put a dimmer switch and a low med high remote on the wall switch. This is absolutely beautiful when it is dim at night. Love love love it! 😀
customer_reviews.author: GrishamGirl

customer_reviews.title: it’s beautiful and I love it
customer_reviews.text: It would be 5 stars if it’d come with all the parts. Now that it’s up, it’s beautiful and I love it. But it took about 4 hrs because all the crystals have to be put on the wires separately. And some hardware was missing. Luckily he had his own stuff to get it done. I think it was probably a returned product they sold as “new.”
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Getting an expert to hang it.
customer_reviews.text: This was for my grown woman bling bedroom that I worked real hard for all of my life. I absolutely love the glam and Douglas was awesome and efficient putting it up.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Smith Washington

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly cheap, missing parts, shock hazard.
customer_reviews.text: I had a professional electrician try to install this--after several hours he said it was missing several essential parts and was literally a shock hazard. He said he couldn't in good conscience install it. Thankfully return was no trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Cookie

customer_reviews.title: Would of liked it more had the chandelier piece was more intricate
customer_reviews.text: Very unique piece. Would of liked it more had the chandelier piece was more intricate. Nevertheless, I do like the piece and it's well priced.
customer_reviews.author: LYDIA

customer_reviews.title: Parts missing Light not functioning.
customer_reviews.text: Parts missing. Called for parts still waiting 4 weeks later. Installation directions do not comply with National Electrical Code. My electrician however did install properly & repaired light that was not working.
customer_reviews.author: Penny B. Ges

customer_reviews.title: I have a piece that was broken upon being shipped ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a piece that was broken upon being shipped. I took a picture of it in its wrapper, as you can see it was broken upon unwrapping. It is one of the five crystal bases for the chandelier.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Lyles

customer_reviews.title: Fast and Easy
customer_reviews.text: We loved it perfect for our TV room. Delivery was fast. A +++
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Second fan has a lot of motor noise ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2 . Beautiful! Love them. One of the fans is very quite but the second fan there is a lot of motor noise...
customer_reviews.author: Renee Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed paid an installer to come install product then one ...
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed paid an installer to come install product then one of the arms was broken had to pay for him to remove it and return
customer_reviews.author: Mayralzsam

customer_reviews.title: ... the Crystal ball and the packing was not that great But the it is good quality
customer_reviews.text: It came missing the Crystal ball and the packing was not that great But the it is good quality
customer_reviews.author: Peter G.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and practival
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect fan combined with a pretty chandelier. I had amazon installers do it for me and I’m glad I did!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So-so
customer_reviews.text: The wiring for the light, did not have good instructions. Luckily I have some experience
customer_reviews.author: troy clawson

customer_reviews.title: Its perfect in my Bedroom
customer_reviews.text: My Handyman installed my Chandelier in my bedroom several weeks ago ( I just bought my house) it took him about 30 mins. My daughter and I put all the Crystals together. It took the both of us about 30 mins. But we enjoyed doing it.. I got all the parts and a few extra crystals as well. I am very happy. No complaints... I have received many compliments on it...
customer_reviews.author: Geminilady

product_meta.title: Warehouse of Tiffany CFL-8213AB Havorand 52" 5-Blade Ceiling Fan Crystal Chandelier
product_meta.description:
Description: 

Add elegance to your living room with this Havorand Chandelier Ceiling Fan. This unique offering is a luxurious alternative to the standard can-type lighted fans. Featuring a majetsic full size crystal chandelier using a variety of high qualty crystal glass shapes. It will light up your home in style along with cooling your home with its highly reliable fan motor found in all our ceiling fans. The five wooden blades rotate at three selectable reversible speeds to insure you get just the right level of air movement.


 * Metal, wood, and crystal construction
 * Chandelier-style design
 * Real crystals
 * 6 Lights
 * Requires (6) E12 @ 40-watt bulbs (not included)
 * Antique bronze finish
 * Switch options: Hand-Pull Chain OR Remote
 * 5 wooden blades
 * Reversible motor


Dimensions:  * Overall dimensions: Height: 15.75 in x Diameter 52-in
 * Each blade measures 20.25 inches long x 6 inches wide
 * Blade Pitch: 12 degrees
 * Motor house size: 4.7 inches tall x 11.8 inches in diameter
 * Down rod measures 4.9 inches


Motor Speeds:  * 170 RPM (Level 1)
 * 130 RPM (Level 2)
 * 100 RPM (Level 3)


Assembly Required 

Professional Installation is Highly Recommended
feature_bullets: Overall Dimensions: 52 inches diameter x 15.75 inches high
Product features: CSA listed, ETL listed, UL listed
